attributes.action: MAKE PUBLIC TRANSPORT SAFE FOR DISABLED PASSENGERS & WHEELCHAIR USER’s TOO!.
attributes.additional_details:
MAKE PUBLIC TRANSPORT SAFE FOR DISABLED PASSENGERS & WHEELCHAIR USER’s TOO!.

All public transport should be legally and must be tested for the safety all passengers. Which including disabled passengers and wheelchair users, plus assistance dogs as well.

Especially in emergency situations, or with regards emergency evacuation’s of public transport (i.e. passenger aircraft / helicopters, buses / coaches, tram / light railway / underground / train carriages, or vessels and hovercraft etc) vehicles.

Also all types of public transport vehicles, should legally provide safety restraints and safe belts, for either the transportation of wheelchair users and disabled passengers, plus assistance dogs too.
